entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switch to bootstrap icons in maui blazor template #15582
    Backlog
  • CollectionView on iOS doesn't decelerate with fling gesture. #15580
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.Diagnostics.BindingDiagnostics warnings are displayed for a grouped CollectionView with an ItemTemplate #15579
    Backlog
  • provide a better error message when binding a "wrong" object to a collectionview which has IsGrouped=true #15577
    Backlog
  • MAUI Pan Gesture Recognizer interruption bug #15576
    Backlog
  • Controls can't be tapped when pushed off view after visibility changes in ScrollView #15575
  • AppThemeBinding usage with BindableProperty #15573
  • CollectionView scrolling is not working inside of other controls without HeightRequest. #15572
    Backlog

Closed

  • [iOS and Mac] - Blank rendering in FlowDirection right to left from .net 7.0 #14406
  • Shadows not rendering properly on different devices #15565
  • My Net To Makes Land #15567
  • Wrong height for multi-line Label under certain conditions #11358
    Backlog
  • TextColor throws exception on Windows Machine #15210
  • `Clipboard.GetTextAsync()` always returns `null` on iOS #9382
  • ICanvas DrawString does not work on MacCatalyst platform #15370

PullRequests

Created

  • Just run the pack every time #15588
  • Fix sizing issues with CollectionView on Windows #15587
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Ignore additional tests for iOS #15513
  • Restore & obsolete Windows MauiWebView ctor #15541
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Add all platforms if build args don't restrict to a single platform #15561
    area/testing

Updated

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • feat: adding IWindowCreator #14921
    community ✨
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • Add Forms->MAUI differences notes to layout dev docs #15551
    area/docs 📓, area/layout 🔲
  • Hook up ScrollViewer event tracking in Windows CollectionView #15555
    area/collectionview 📃
